abstract: Centers for Disease Control says E coli outbreaks at Chipotle Mexican Grill restaurants are apparently over, but concedes failure to trace cause of illness.
lead_paragraph: The agency said investigators were unable to specify the food or ingredient responsible for the E. coli outbreaks that have sickened about 60 people in several states.

headline.main: C.D.C. Ends Chipotle Case With Illness Still a Mystery
headline.print_headline: C.D.C. Ends Chipotle Case With Illness Still a Mystery

snippet: The agency said investigators were unable to specify the food or ingredient responsible for the E. coli outbreaks that have sickened about 60 people in several states.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
